pending_description: Please wait while the Google Play Store verifies your purchases. This may take several minutes.

authFlowMessageFullName: Please re-verify your phone number to change your name:
authFlowPhoneVerifyNote: You will receive a one time automated SMS message to verify your phone number. Carrier SMS charges may apply. Phone numbers will be used for identification purposes. It will not be shown to other users.

title: Title
itemShopDesc: This is a description for an item.

authErrorPhoto: Sorry, you must enter a photo to continue.
authErrorPhone: Sorry, you must enter a country code and phone number to continue.

describeVerify: Verify your phone number to play with friends and compete in the weekly tournament!
verifyForNameChange: Please verify your phone number before changing your name
changeNameWarning: Are you sure you want to change your full name? Using your real full name helps your friends identify who you are. If you want to enter a name other than your real name, you should set your nickname, which identifies you in game leaderboard and chats.
foundfriendslower: if any of these are not your friends, uncheck the row to block them.
blockfriendsupper: Do you want to block these friends?
blockedtextmessage: You can unblock these friends later from your profile
iosContactsSettings: Go to iOS settings to let this game access your contacts.
iosMustEnableContacts: In order to find friends and family on Weeby, please allow {this game} to access your contacts.  You can do this by going to Settings > Privacy > Contacts and turning {this game} ON.
syncContacts: Tap here to find my contacts on Weeby.
privacyPolicy1: By clicking 'I Agree' below, I hereby agree to Weeby's Terms of Service:
phoneNumberNotValid: The phone number you entered is not valid for:
missingCountry: You must enter a country code.
missingFirstName: You must enter a first name.
missingLastName: You must enter a last name.
phoneNumberCorrect: We will send an SMS to this phone number. Is it correct?
sitBackAndRelax: Sit back and relax while we automatically verify your number!

codeTooShort: Verification code must be 4 digits long.
notMobileNumber: This is not a moblile number for the country:
